coreAtributes.authorTag: "Tailored by the DSG Textile Guild" is crudely sewn into the fabric near the side seam.
coreAtributes.name: linen shirt
coreAtributes.description: A simple short-sleeved shirt made from coarse linen. The sides are partially slitted to allow for good mobility despite the length. Although it's meant to be worn as an undershirt, it is opaque enough to be worn as an outer garment.

replacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(help)] [npc2.name] [npc2.verb(put)] [npc2.her] arms through the linen shirt's sleeves as [npc.she] [npc.verb(pull)] the rest down over [npc2.her] torso.
replacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(stuff)] [npc2.name] [npc2.verb(put)] [npc2.her] arms into the linen shirt's sleeves as [npc.she] roughly [npc.verb(pull)] the rest down over [npc2.her] torso.

displacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(grab)] hold of [npc2.namePos] combat shirt and roughly pull it off over [npc2.her] head.

replacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(pull)] [npc.her] linen shirt back down over [npc.her] torso.
replacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(pull)] [npc2.namePos] linen shirt back down over [npc2.her] torso.
replacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] roughly [npc.verb(pull)] [npc2.namePos] linen shirt back down over [npc2.her] torso.

displacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(pull)] [npc.her] linen shirt up to just below [npc.her] chin.
displacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(pull)] [npc2.namePos] linen shirt up to just below [npc2.her] chin.
displacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] roughly [npc.verb(pull)] [npc2.namePos] linen shirt up to just below [npc2.her] chin.
